Introduction

Choi Si Won is a South Korean singer, songwriter, model, and actor. He is famous for being the vocalist, visual, and face of the group Super Junior and its sub-unit Super Junior-M under SM Entertainment.

Fun facts

1
Siwon is one of the wealthiest Kpop idols. His Father is a CEO of a major business while his Mother also owned a lingerie brand.
…
2
Siwon was on the Chinese version of "We Got Married" where he was paired with Chinese Model, Liu Wen.
…
3
Siwon served as a conscripted policeman from November 19, 2015 - August 18, 2017.
…
